mapper.sql: id, creater, create_time, editor, edit_time, version, merchant_code, merchant_name, licence, email, mobile, remark,status
mapper.insert:
insert into merchant
id,
creater,
create_time,
editor,
edit_time,
version,
merchant_code,
merchant_name,
licence,
email,
mobile,
remark,
status
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status}
mapper.update:
update merchant
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merchant_name = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licence = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update merchant set creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_name = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} status = #{status} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM merchant WHERE merchant_code = #{merchantCode}
